definition: on or relating to or characteristic of the region or peoples beyond the Alps from Italy (or north of the Alps), one living on or coming from the other side of the Alps from Italy
details:
adjective
- on or relating to or characteristic of the region or peoples beyond the Alps from Italy (or north of the Alps)
= example: on or relating to or characteristic of the region or peoples beyond the Alps from Italy (or north of the Alps)
= synonyms: ultramontane
noun
- one living on or coming from the other side of the Alps from Italy
